definition: a shared on-line journal where people can post diary entries about their personal experiences and hobbies, to read, write, or edit a shared on-line journal
details:
noun
- a shared on-line journal where people can post diary entries about their personal experiences and hobbies
= example: a shared on-line journal where people can post diary entries about their personal experiences and hobbies
= synonyms: web log
verb
- to read, write, or edit a shared on-line journal
= example: to read, write, or edit a shared on-line journal
